posts.post_content: It's good instant speed removal that has the potential to kill token swarms. It's also not picky about what it can kill as opposed to doom blade. If you're running heavy black like devotion this is your best early removal spell you have access to, although it becomes more of a combat trick later into a game.
posts.html:
It's good instant speed removal that has the potential to kill token swarms. It's also not picky about what it can kill as opposed to doom blade. If you're running heavy black like devotion this is your best early removal spell you have access to, although it becomes more of a combat trick later into a game.
